column3: great descents on rim brakes ... no problem at all.  clearly, these manufacturers are trying to solve braking problems on road bike which never existed in the first place

Rapha films are AMAZING whether you're a cycling fanatic or not.  This one is special to me ... finishing in my old home town.
More Rapha brilliance. Great cinematography, musical scores and editing. Very inspirational!
